profiles.name: Salman Khan
profiles.message: A few months back, I realised that I needed to be more sincere in my salaat. As a non-arabic speaker, once I read the translation earnestly, it made a significant difference to my focus & intentions. I can honestly say, the practice of salaat has rejuvenated my faith. And that was the motivation behind wanting this app out there.
